Text:
1) Install and use trial
2) Close everything related to camtasia
3) Place crack into installed directory and open it once.
4) Enjoy, the application is now cracked, and you will not be prompted with a invalid key, etc.. just asking if you'd like to update or not (don't recommend)

I installed it and blocked the program from validating it and that is the bad part. If it can't connect to the internet, then it'll still give you only 30 days. If you allow it to connect to the internet, then it checks the key and blacklists it.

Plus the guy above me doesn't know what he is talking about. There is no crack for this. Just a list of Names and serials for the program.


Where is the crack uploader????
